title: Contracts home page
content:
• Contracts summary

    The Contracts Home Page displays a numbered summary of the contracts you have with your vendors. Clicking a tile opens a list of relevant contracts in the Contracts page.

    Filter Description
    Expire next month The number of contracts that will expire in the next calendar month.
    Expire in next 3 months The number of contracts that will expire in the next three calendar months.
    Suspended The number of contracts that are both suspended and active.
    Effective next month The number of contracts that will become effective in the next calendar month.

  • Search

    If you know the name of the contract (or part of it), you can use the global search to search for a specific contract.

    For more information about performing global searches and filtering the results, see Search and Filters.

Related topics

  • Contract Management
  • How to create or update a contract record
  • Contract workflow
